entry.title: A story of a dependable boyfriend getting his ears cleaned by a cute gloomy girlfriend
entry.content: 彼氏依存の甘々ネガティブ彼女に耳かきをされて気持ち良くなるお話CV: えもこ (twitter)Upload date: 23-03-2022MIC: KU100 (big important info)好き〜Big return of the kareshi-kunおかえりなさい、彼氏くんWelcome back, boyfriend-kun!ご飯？ううん、これでいいよRice? No need, this is fine!いつもありがとうThank you for everything好きI love you何？Wa- What is it?え？声に言ってて可愛いって？Eh? It’s really cute when I say it out loud?私可愛いとかそんなんじゃBut it’s not like I’m actually cute..うん、ご飯食べようOkay.. Let’s eatいただきますitadakimasu~Big dialogue while consuming 食べ物ねえ、彼氏くん、その。。。私、バカで可愛くもないしHey, boyfriend-kun, well.. I’m dumb and not cute at all美人さんでもないしI’m not much of a beauty either..胸。。小さいしMy chest.. is really small料理もできないしI can’t even cook何もできないしI can’t do anything..いつも暗いしAnd I’m always so gloomy彼氏くん、こんな彼女いやでしょうIt must be awful to have a girlfriend like thisいやじゃない？本当？お世辞でも嬉しいよYou don’t think so? Really?いやじゃない？本当？お世辞でも嬉しいよEven if it’s just flattery, it still makes me happyお世辞じゃないよ？やっぱり彼氏くんは優しいねYou really mean it? You truly are kind, boyfriend-kun (big weird sounding lol)うん ごちそうさまThank you for the mealGirlfriend big enters kareshi-kun’s room (osuHOW)もしもしーmoshi moshi~その、まだ起きる？Um.. are you still awake?あのーその。。あぁ。。 あー あぁあーあのUmm um-今日は耳かきしてあげる。I’ll give you an ear cleaning today- !急にどうしたのって？What’s with me so suddenly?あーああー ごめん。。Ah um- Sorry…私にされても嫌なだけだよね？You’d just hate it if I was the one to do it, right?ごめん、忘れて。I’m sorry, please forget it..いやあ、ああああ、えええNo umm.. a- um..その。。耳かきのASMRが履歴にあったからIt’s because there is a lot of ASMR ear cleaning videos in your history見てたら可愛い子いっぱいでand all of the girls in them are really cute..私、彼氏くんいなくなったら生きていけないからif Boyfriend-kun left me, I wouldnt be able to keep on living..これくらいならできるかなって思ってSo I thought „If it’s this much maybe I can do it too”何かしないとって 、思ってI felt like I needed to do something, or else…してたりとかそんなことはしない？寧ろ嬉しい？本当？You don’t mind if I clean them? 1 If anything you’d actually be happy? Really?hizamakura kita!!じゃー膝枕してあげるね！Then- Let me give you a lap pillow!大丈夫？私の膝枕、おかしくないかな。。Is it okay? My lap pillow isn’t weird ..right?良かった！That’s a relief..じゃ、右耳からするね。Then, I’ll start with the right earどうかな？大丈夫？How is it? Is it fine?続けるねI will continue then~耳垢すごい溜まってるよThe earwax has really piled up, huhあんまりしないもんねIt’s because you don’t clean it enough..彼氏くん、いっぱいしてあげられるThen I will clean it lots~動かないで、彼氏くんに手がされたらー 私死んじゃうWa- Don’t move, if your hand touches mine- I might pass out..気持ち？Does it feel good?一回、ふうってするねIm going to blow in your ear, okay?ふぅはぁ 。。ふぅーFu~カリカリ〜カリカリ〜scratchy, scratchy~彼氏くん気持ちよさそうit looks like you’re feeling good私でもできてる？So even if it’s me doing it, it’s okay?彼氏くん、今だけでいいから私のことだけ考えて欲しいのBoyfriend-kun, please think only of me, even if it’s just for a momentまたワガママ言ってる？ごめんなさいI’m saying selfish things again? I’m sorry..梵天するねI’ll clean with the fluffy side now~大丈夫？Is it okay?良かったI’m gladいっぱい取れるすごいI took this much… Amazingもう少しで終わるから、待っててねI’m almost done, so please hold on a little longer~最後にふぅってするねAnd now for the last ear blow~ふーfuu~右、終わったよ！Right ear is all clean!下手くそだったよねThat was really bad, wasn’t it?ごめん。。I’m sorry..え？良かったから反対もお願い？Eh? It was great so you want to have the other ear cleaned as well?分かった！ありがとうGot it! Thank you!じゃ左耳やるねThen, I’ll do the left ear now~ふーFuu~こっちも耳垢溜まってるねThere’s a lot piled up in this ear as well定期気しなちゃだめだよyou need to clean them regularly, you know?私が言っても説得力が何もないかWell, even if I say that it´s not like you’ll actually listen to me, huhカリカリ〜カリカリ〜scratchy, scratchy~yawnごめんね, 欠伸しちゃったAh, sorry for yawning大丈夫眠たいとかじゃないからIt’s fine, I’m not sleepy or anything安心ちゃっただけ 私にもできることがあったってI’m just relieved that there is something even I can do可愛い？褒めないでよI’m cute? Please don’t praise me..嬉しくなっちゃうor I might get happyふーFuu~ごめんね急にふうしちゃったA- Sorry for the sudden fuu~I’m Sorry..気持ち良かったIt felt good?じゃ、ふうするねThen.. I will fuu moreふぅぅFuu~~梵天しよかBonten time~There we go-最高？It feels amazing?こっちも最後にーAnd now the very last fu-ふぅFuu~左も終わったよLeft one is done too~どうだったかなUm how was it?彼氏くんの役に立てたかなWas I useful to you?気持ち良かった？もっと自身もって？It felt great so I should have more confidence?ありがとう！Thank you!私も少し自分に自身が持ってたするI feel like I got a bit more confident in myself too毎日やって欲しい？やるすぎは良くないよ！ 。。多分You want me to do it everyday?? Doing it too much is not good! ..probably?じゃ、また明日するThen.. I will do it again tomorrowだから他の子とか、見ないで欲しいのSo, don’t look at other girls anymore, okay?本音 言えたじゃんって？I let out my true intentions?今日はなんか意地悪な気がするAwa It kinda feels like you are a big bully today..寝るよね！You are going to sleep now?おやすみなさいGood night~大好き！I love you~ Actually, what it means literally is more like “You don’t mind if I play a role like they do in these videos?” But since my explanation here already sounds weird there’s no way I would be able to word it well here and I think it’s good enough” ↩
